about_the_game:
The Two Thinkers is an exciting cooperative platformer and puzzle game that will test your skills and patience to think logically, solve problems, and collaborate with your partner. In this title, two players must join forces and minds to overcome obstacles, activate mechanisms, and discover the path to the exit in each level. But beware: if one of you fails, you’ll have to start over!

Perfect for sharing with someone special, having fun, and spending quality time, this game is ideal for those who enjoy logic-based challenges and teamwork.

Key Features

  • Challenging Cooperative Platforming: Designed specifically for two players who must work together to progress. Not recommended for solo play.

  • Level-Based Progression: The game includes a total of 30 unique levels, some of which may be tough to beat but never impossible. Each level introduces new challenges or mechanics and ramps up the difficulty, ensuring a fresh and rewarding experience.

  • Extreme Challenge Mode: For the bravest players, each level includes an additional extreme difficulty mode. This mode is designed to test players' dexterity and reflexes, adding new obstacles and mechanics that require precision and great skill to overcome.

  • Gameplay Mechanics: Interact with switches, moving platforms, portals, ropes, and more while avoiding traps and enemies.

  • Captivating Visual Style: Charming pixel-art graphics with a retro aesthetic that evokes the nostalgia of classic games.

  • Controller Support: Want to enhance your experience? Simply connect controllers or joysticks to your device, and you're ready to play!

  • Perfect for Sharing: The ideal experience to play locally with a friend or family member, whether on the same device or remotely using Steam Remote Play Together.

I hope you enjoy it and have fun!

short_description: A challenging puzzle and platformer game for 2 players. Play with a friend, combine your skills, think logically, and overcome obstacles together to reach the exit and complete each level. Only by working as a team will you be able to overcome every challenge and progress!
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
